name: Free Throw Focus
description: 10 sets of 10 free throws with form checks.

name: Dribble Maze
description: Navigate cones with both hands at speed.

name: Speed Dribble
description: Sprint while dribbling from baseline to baseline.

name: Defensive Slide Drill
description: Improve lateral quickness with defensive slides.

name: Box Out and Rebound
description: Practice boxing out opponents and securing rebounds.

name: Pick and Roll Simulation
description: Practice pick and roll moves with a partner.

name: Layup Line
description: Continuous layups with focus on form and speed.

name: Passing Accuracy
description: Target practice for chest and bounce passes.

name: Endurance Run
description: Run full court sprints to improve stamina.

name: Crossover Drill
description: Master quick crossover moves with cones.

name: Jump Shot Routine
description: Practice jump shots from mid-range spots.

name: Ball Handling Circuit
description: Dribble drills using both hands and various speeds.

name: Closeout Drill
description: Practice closing out on shooters quickly and under control.

name: Free Throw Pressure
description: Simulate game pressure during free throws.
